title: Life Hack Alert
description: Today I found out you can regrow the green onions you buy at the store.. you just cut off what you need and stick the roots in a cup of water. Watch them grow so fast, endless green onions!

title: How Much Water?
description: I bought a Bamboo Palm the other day and the lady at the store wasn't very helpful when I asked how much water to give it.. any suggestions??

title: Bug Help!!
description: My orange tree has these little bugs all over it and I'm not sure what they are or how to get rid of them. HELP!
